TopicTitle: (Solved) Changing Peaks Along with Radius in Kopernicus

Articles.Content:
I've been messing around with kopernicus, modifying the stock bodies, and I've run into an amusing problem. If I reduce a planet's radius with

 

@Properties
        {
            radius = (reduced value)
        }

 the planet shrinks alright, but for some reason its peaks stay at a similar height value. I made bop 1/10 Phobos's size and it looked like a hedgehog! I admit this is pretty funny, but how can I shrink a planet so this doesn't happen?

Nevermind, this was easily fixed by using SigmaDimensions.
